snippet: You could call John Cariani an absurdist, but his work so far is distinguished equally by another factor: shortness. “Love/Sick,” his latest, is being staged now through June 22 at TheaterWorks Hartford.
abstract: Playwright John Cariani's work is defined by both absurdist humor and brevity; his latest effort, Love/Sick, a collection of 10 short vignettes, is being staged in June at TheaterWorks Hartford (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: You could call John Cariani an absurdist, but his work so far is distinguished equally by another factor: shortness. “Love/Sick,” his latest, is being staged now through June 22 at TheaterWorks Hartford.

headline.main: Love Is Out of This World. Far Out.
headline.print_headline: Love Is Out of This World. Far Out.
